DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety performance I-ZIP Ocular Bandage subject undergoing uneventful unilateral clear corneal phacoemulsification foldable monofocal intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation compare Oasis 24-hour Soft Shield Collagen Corneal Shield ( Oasis Medical , Inc. Glendora , California ) provide ocular protection relief pain discomfort acute post-operative period .
DOC.criteria: Subject cataract expect undergo unilateral clear corneal cataract surgery phacoemulsification implantation posterior chamber monofocal intraocular lens incision â‰¤ 3.5mm width measure IOL implantation use internal caliper . Any intraocular inflammation study eye present screen slitlamp examination presence ocular pain operative eye rat preoperative NRPS Previous surgery ( laser incisional ) ocular trauma operative eye plan multiple procedure cataract/IOL implantation surgery Potential BCVA fellow eye worse 20/40 assessed clinical Investigator Active history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease ( iritis , scleritis , uveitis , iridocyclitis , rubeosis iritis ) , evidence acute external ocular infection , intraocular infection , dysthyroid ophthalmopathy , nasolacrimal duct obstruction , active chalazion , uncontrolled blepharitis , uncontrolled clinically significant dry eye syndrome , anything trace guttata ( > 10 guttae central 6 mm cornea ) , evidence glaucoma/glaucoma suspect , corneal dystrophy ocular disease would interfere study evaluation Subject currently receive antineoplastic therapy Use topical ocular steroid within 14 day and/or systemic steroid ( exclude inhalant ) within 30 day prior surgery . Subject insulindependent diabetic background diabetic retinopathy ( BDR ) , proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( PDR ) compromise macular function
